jodd.mail

Class SmtpSslServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.mail.MailServer<SendMailSession>
      • jodd.mail.SmtpServer
        • jodd.mail.SmtpSslServer

  • public class SmtpSslServer
extends SmtpServer
    Secure SMTP server (STARTTLS) for sending emails.

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • startTlsRequired

        public SmtpSslServer startTlsRequired(boolean startTlsRequired)
        Sets mail.smtp.starttls.required.

        If the server doesn't support the STARTTLS command, or the command fails, the connect method will fail. Defaults to false.

        Parameters:
        startTlsRequired - If true, requires the use of the STARTTLS command.
        Returns:
        this

      • plaintextOverTLS

        public SmtpSslServer plaintextOverTLS(boolean plaintextOverTLS)
        When enabled, MAIL_SMTP_SOCKET_FACTORY_CLASS will be not set, and Plaintext Authentication over TLS will be enabled.
        Parameters:
        plaintextOverTLS - true when plain text authentication over TLS should be enabled.
        Returns:
        this
